values:
Ok. Got my books in today for this term of online classes for my Bachelors in Paralegal Science. I'm still wondering why I have to take Statistics, but I'll lump it. Just scared. Last time I took a math class was back when I was going to Hill for my Associates. All these funny symbols scare me. Aaaand I have no clue as to how I'm going to "show my work" in a word document. Any pointers????? And what's that funny 'E' symbol thing again? I got in over my head huh? Qualitative, Quantitative....what the heck do they have to do with the law profession???? *grrr* Ok. I will be ok. I had to vent to someone who understands me and won't get aggravated with my "rantinginonebreathandnotunderstandingawordIsay" mood. 

Remember that April? We used to talk like that and actually understand each other. Oh, in case you don't know, LaVerne is now in Pittsburgh, or somewhere close to it. Still not quite sure where your actually at. But she might need someone close to her for support. I'm still in TEXAS for pete's sake. Do I need to move up there too???? Maybe I'll find the perfect soul mate up there. I'll stop on that one right now. That's for another blog and things are actually going fairly well right now...I think. But then again just when I think that, things seem to go down hill. *sheesh* Ok. I'm done. Advice anyone, please? (on the school thing at least...lol) My love to you both and all the kids. HIIIII DOODLE!!! My little ones say hi to him as well and want to meet him. That might be a good spring break trip...hmmm...i'll contemplate on that one and get back to ya. *huggles*

Hey all. This is my first entry on here. I have my friend to thank for showing me this site. I think it's going to help me out right now. I am going through some changes in my life right now and being able to get it out on here is going to make me feel better. Anyhoo, I will do my best to keep this going on a regular basis. And thanks April for showing me this. You don't know how much it means to me to have you back in my life. Now hopefully I will be able to find myself with your help..lol. Talk to ya'll later!
